name: My Furry Dragon 🐾
description:
WISHLIST OUR NEW GAME:

Every "Hero's journey" starts with a call to adventure, a quest that is given to a hero. Our hero, despite the fact that he doesn't want to be a "Hero", is forced to start this journey by receiving a quest from the King - he must save the Princess, who was kidnapped by a mighty Terrifying Dragon. But, as it turns out, the Dragon is not that "Terrifying" as everyone described her, she is actually just a beautiful girl who saved the Princess from a magical curse.

Our hero decides to stay a little longer with the Dragon, and slowly their affection towards each other increases...

My Furry Dragon is a short novel about love, self-discovery, family, and having fun with a dragon!

Features:

• Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
• HD fully original artworks.
• 2 hours of content.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Hot dragon!
